about.name: Salah Eddine Makdour
about.title: Software Engineer & AI Specialist
about.bio: I'm a 4th year software engineering student at the National Higher School of Artificial Intelligence (ENSIA) with expertise in full-stack web development, mobile development, and AI solutions. I specialize in building innovative applications and solutions that solve real-world problems using cutting-edge technologies.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Worked on advanced loss prevention engineering software solutions. Developed and optimized applications to improve security measures and reduce inventory shrinkage for retail businesses.

experience.title: Software Engineering & AI Intern
experience.description: Built AI and Computer Vision solutions on edge devices using Python.

experience.title: Software Engineering & AI Intern
experience.description: Built AI and Computer Vision solutions on edge devices using Python.

experience.title: Co-Founder & Ex-President
experience.description: Founded and led the technical community at ENSIA. Mentored workshops in AI, software development, and electronics.

education.institution: The National Higher School of Artificial Intelligence (ENSIA)
education.description: Specializing in artificial intelligence and software engineering.

education.institution: Chadli Benjdid High School, Bordj Bounaama
education.description: Graduated with an average of 17.95 in Mathematics stream.

projects.title: Forest Fire Detection and Monitoring System
projects.description: Developed an intelligent system for early detection and real-time monitoring of forest fires using computer vision and AI technologies. The solution processes video streams from strategic camera placements to identify fire patterns and smoke signatures, enabling immediate alerts to authorities. Optimized for edge deployment on NVIDIA Jetson devices, allowing autonomous operation in remote areas with limited connectivity.

projects.title: Face Detection and Identification System
projects.description: Engineered a comprehensive facial recognition system capable of detecting and identifying individuals in real-time video streams. The solution combines advanced computer vision techniques with optimized deep learning models to provide accurate identification even in challenging lighting conditions. Implemented on edge devices for privacy-preserving processing and minimal latency, making it suitable for access control and security applications.

projects.title: Equipment Inspections Platform
projects.description: Designed and implemented a comprehensive web-based platform that streamlines the equipment inspection process for industrial safety companies. The solution features digital inspection forms, automated reporting, client dashboards, and maintenance scheduling with notification systems. This platform has significantly reduced paperwork, improved inspection accuracy, and enhanced client communication for safety-critical industrial environments.

projects.title: Notiverse App
projects.description: Founder and Developer of the Notiverse App. A mobile application that allows users to organize their notes seamlessly

projects.title: SatisUniv
projects.description: A platform designed to improve school stakeholder satisfaction through better communication and feedback systems.

projects.title: CourseSeeker
projects.description: Software engineering course project focusing on backend development with TypeScript, Express.js, and PostgreSQL.

projects.title: ENSIA Hub Library Website
projects.description: Managed and led the development of a library website for the ENSIA Tech Community club, providing resources for students.

projects.title: ETC Club Website
projects.description: Developed the official website for ENSIA Tech Community club using Next.js framework.

projects.title: COVID-19 Shopping App
projects.description: Top 15 Project in IEEE Quarantine Hackathon. Developed a mobile application to facilitate safe shopping during the COVID-19 pandemic.
